title: Lenovo M10 FHD REL 3 GB RAM 32 GB ROM 10.04 inch with Wi-Fi Only Tablet (Slate Black)

product_specification.Additional Features: Dual Front Facing Speakers, FM Radio
product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Travel Adapter, Micro USB Cable, SIM Pin, Warranty Card, Quick Start Guide
product_specification.Other Camera Features: Auto Focus Rear and Fixed Focus Front Camera
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: WiFi Direct, WiFi Display, Bluetooth Support, 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz Dual Band Wireless Connectivity
product_specification.Other Display Features: Full HD LCD Backlit Multi Touch IPS Display (70% Color Gamut, 320 nits Brightness)
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Fast Processing: This tab makes use of the Qualcomm Snapdragon quad-core 2.0 GHz chip to give you fast processing performance. This way, you can enjoy lag-free use.
product_description.Strong Connection: Thanks to the support of WLAN 802.11a/b/g/n/ ac, you can enjoy fast and strong connectivity so that you can game, stream movies, and more with ease.
product_description.Dual Front-facing Speakers: With this tab, you can enjoy a booming surround sound experience as it has dual front speakers with Dolby Audio.
product_description.Kids Mode: This tab comes with a kids mode that helps you customise the content for your child. You can protect their usage with the specialised parent control and eye protection mode.
product_description.Facial Recognition: You can conveniently unlock this device in a jiffy, thanks to its facial recognition technology.

My experience with the seller - I ordered the tab on 21st March, and received it on 23rd, but the screen was broken (probably due to mishandling during shipment). Under flipkart's and the seller's replacement policy, I got a new tab on 26th March. It's okay, mistakes do happen, but I'll advise everyone to record a video as an evidence while unboxing any expensive item bought from an online portal. I am happy that flipkart and the seller paid attention to my complain and rectified the mistake.

My experience with the tab - I bought it solely for online studies. You can guess looking at the tab's specs that it is not meant for heavy apps or gaming. I chose this one (the older version of M10 tab - M10 FHD REL) instead of the newer version (M10 FHD Plus) because while the newer one has 4GB RAM, its battery is only about 5000mAh. This one has a longer battery life, with a battery of about 7000mAh. For studies- my primary requirements were- okay-ish camera and performance, but good display and battery life.

The battery backup is good, and the tab runs for 1-1.5 days after a full charge. Screen and display resolution is very crisp (it is full HD), and the sound output is also good (has Dolby Atmos output).

Performance is okay-ish. It will lag if you run heavy apps/games, but will otherwise run smoothly if you are watching videos or studying, etc. Camera is also okay-ish. Even though the rear camera is 8MP, it is not as good as Samsung tab A7's 8MP camera. You can't use it for photography, however it is enough for casual photos or for important documents.

All in all, it is a perfect tab for studying. But if you want performance - then go for a tab with atleast 4GB RAM.
Very nice product after using 15 days . The best tab under 15k. I love this product the lastest android version.

Good product in this price range. Good for study purposes, not for gaming. Battery backup is good, lasts for 3 days with moderate use. Camera is not so good, unable to perform face unlock very often. Sound is good with dolby Atmos. If you have a budget of below 15k, then go for it.

This is an awesome tablet.
1) Camera: The camera is not bad for tablet. It however could have been better.

2) Battery: There is no compromise on battery. It’s great and lasting. For normal purposes this is a big plus.

3) Performance: Performance is so so. A very few times I found the tab freezing for two seconds but overall the performance is great for doing office works and entertainment. Now this isn’t an iPad don’t expect flawless handling but it’s quite great.

4) Sound: Sound definitely could have improved so I use headphones.

5) Face Detection: I don’t know why many have said face detection isn’t working. For me it works most of the times. I have a iPhone. Now for obvious reasons we can’t expect the face recognisation to be like iPhone but it’s pretty good.

THIS IS A MUST FOR ALL WHO WANTS TO DO ONLINE CLASSES,TEACH DO OFFICE WORK.

Coming to the not so good points. I'm unable to get android updates no matter what troubleshooting steps I try . Tab is still stuck at Android 9 version. The product description (WiFi only model) states that it has expandable memory via SD card. Due to this I bought an SD card seperately from here (which is also useless now). The tablet has one SIM/SD card slot which is locked & doesn't open with a pin opener (basically its the Data+ WiFi unit with the slot locked, pin wasn't provided which should have been first sign of the issue, in fact nothing provided except charger). I wouldn't have bought it if description said memory couldn't be expanded. As it is, out of 32gb internal memory you get ~28gb & after OS & pre-installed stuff you get <25gb. Moreover most system apps don't show on tab (except Camera), so you need to download everything, further reducing the space available. It says "fast charging" but first full charge took ~6 hours. Its 8mp camera gives grainy images. Far from VFM @13K (& you have to buy screen guard/accessories seperately). Manufacturer & Flipkart are just busy cheating the customer together via hiding info/providing misinformation. Taking advantage of people ordering from home during the pandemic. UPDATE - post usage for couple of days - its USP was 7000mAH battery which is horrible, it performs worse than my 4000mAh phone. It claims Fast charging which is false - takes 5-6 hours for full charge. Doesn't work like a 3gb RAM tab should. Have had to put it on battery saver permanently within 4 days. Cheated of 13K (+ addn money spent on accessories since nothing was provided). If this is the best rated tab in sub 15K price then there's no hope for anyone.
